nodes.text: "Serenity Starscapes" was an award-winning musical composition from the homeworld of Sturg Ganna. The song had four chords.

A receptionist once played this song as hold music when the Dor Namethian Lexo Sooger placed a comlink call to Ganna. As the song was played repeatedly in a loop, Sooger found it almost a release to hear the voice of Ganna, even though he despised him. The song was Ganna's favorite, played for him whenever he visited Zord's Spa and Bathhouse. Sooger considered the song "predictable and twee," one composed for creatures with limited frequency range.
